participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is creative and outgoing, always eager to share her love for music and gaming with others.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is adventurous and spirited, with a passion for speed and a love for the open road.
participant_2.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. my main transportation is my motorbike. i have light skin with big brown eyes. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.
